About 74,000 men 74,000 woman , age 55-74 year , randomize 50/50 basis screen usual care arm . Additional blood collect screened subject saliva buccal cell control subject . Pathologic tissue obtain case develop cancer select related disease ( e.g. , colon polyp , benign prostatic hyperplasia ) .
